HERO_DESCRIPTION: Get in touch with the FastComments team
SALES_MEETING_TEXT: Use Calendly in the bottom right to setup a call.
EMAIL_SUPPORT_TEXT: You can reach us via email at [click to show support email].
EMAIL_HIDDEN_REASON: The email his hidden to help prevent automated scraping of our contact information.
EMAIL_SALES_TEXT: You can reach us via email at [click to show sales email].
PHONE_TEXT: You can reach us via phone at [click to show phone].
PHONE_HIDDEN_REASON: The phone his hidden to help prevent automated scraping of our contact information.
PHONE_AVAILABILITY: We are generally available 9-5 Mon-Fri PST.
HEADING_ALTERNATIVE_CONTACT: An Alternative, Reliable Way to Contact Us
ALTERNATIVE_CONTACT_TEXT_1: Another way to reach out to us is via the Help Request page.
ALTERNATIVE_CONTACT_TEXT_2: We have a 24 hour SLA for answering requests via this mechanism.
ALTERNATIVE_CONTACT_TEXT_3: This page requires that you have an account.
ALTERNATIVE_CONTACT_TEXT_4: If you want to do business with us, then use this page to create your account.
ALTERNATIVE_CONTACT_TEXT_5: If you're a commenter or already have an account - go here. If you don't have an account, this page will create one for you.
